info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 4:10PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Bladen and east central Robeson Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 408 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a broken line of strong thunderstorms extending from Clinton to near Ammon to Ruskin to near Hestertown. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts between 30 to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elizabethtown, Bladenboro, Ruskin, Bladen Community College, Abbottsburg, Lisbon, Butters, Lagoon, White Lake, Dublin and Bladen County Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
